messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Update the phone number of the last person I sent a message to to +10293847563
Could you please provide me with the name or any identifier of the last person you sent a message to? This will help me find the correct contact to update.

Unfortunately, without specific information such as the name, phone number, or any other identifier, I cannot locate the contact to update the phone number. If you have any other detail or access to your message history, that would be helpful.
I don't have more info, can you use the tools you have to figure it out?

Unfortunately, I don't have access to message history or any external communication records. My ability to interact with data is limited to the contacts specifically within this system, and I require a unique identifier to locate the contact you wish to update.

If you have any other clues or information, please let me know, and I'll do my best to assist you!

In that case, I recommend checking your message history or any other record where the contact might be listed, and providing any usable identifier (like a name or part of the phone number) that can assist in searching for the contact. Without such information, I'm unable to proceed with locating and modifying the contact. If you can access those details, please share them here.
